title: How should I go about writing a thank you letter to a scholarship giver? - Quora

response.answer_text: The letter is always dated and has a reference number to the letter informing one of receipt of scholarship. Salutation is usually addressed to the person who has signed off on said letter. After which there are thanks to them (and/or the other members of the scholarship committee). A short paragraph stating acceptance of scholarship and willingness to abide by all required regulations for receipt of scholarship. Reiterate thanks. Sign off. Keep it short and to the point.
